channel.title: Thieve stalls
channel.description: ugh i thought i knew where they would be but no where do i find, the item rewards from thieve stalls, and how much exp etc simple question but i dont have the right simple answer :/

item.title: Thieve stalls
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

These aren’t my codes… they are from ZDR.

let’s say this is your stall:
if ((objectID == 2561)) {
actionAmount++;

            if (actionTimer == 0) {
                if ((playerLevel[17]) <= 0) {
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need to be level 0 to steal from cake stalls.");
                } else if ((playerLevel[17]) >= 0) {
                    sendMessage("You attempt to steal some cake...");
                    actionName = "cakestall";
                    actionTimer = 4;
                    startAnimation(543);
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else if (actionTimer >= 1) {
                    sendMessage(
                            "You have to wait until you can steal another cake.");
                }
            }
        }

here is the rewards code(goes under your stalls):

        if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("silverstall")) {
            sendMessage("You sucessfully stole some really Rare Silver Items!!");
            addSkillXP((20 * playerLevel[17]), 16);
            actionName = "";
        }

You should be able to figure how to add an item xD

Read full topic
